definitions.definition: ( usually in the plural ) A string or flat strip of pasta or other dough , usually cooked (at least initially ) by boiling , and served in soup or in a dry form mixed with a sauce and other ingredients .
examples: She slurped a long noodle up out of her soup.
She is cooking noodles for dinner.

definitions.definition: ( by extension ) An object which is long and thin like a noodle (sense 1) .

subdefinitions.definition: ( informal ) Ellipsis of pool noodle ( “ a long, slender tube or rod, extruded from buoyant foam and usually brightly coloured, used as an exercise tool or toy in swimming pools ” ) .

definitions.definition: ( archaic ) A dumpling cooked by boiling and served in soup; a knaidel or knödel .

main_definition: ( usually in the plural ) A string or flat strip of pasta or other dough , usually cooked (at least initially ) by boiling , and served in soup or in a dry form mixed with a sauce and other ingredients .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) An object which is long and thin like a noodle (sense 1) .
( archaic ) A dumpling cooked by boiling and served in soup; a knaidel or knödel .

definitions.definition: ( dated ) A person with poor judgment ; a fool .

main_definition: ( dated ) A person with poor judgment ; a fool .

definitions.definition: An improvised passage of music played on an instrument ; also, a series of ornamental notes played on an instrument; a trill .

main_definition: ( chiefly jazz ) An improvised passage of music played on an instrument ; also, a series of ornamental notes played on an instrument; a trill .
